contest-event.event-date: Jan. 31, 1993 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) A Kensington Concerto Leisure Centre, Peterlee, County Durham, England, UK Best sporano - Malcolm Usher (Fishburn). Prizes - 1st £125 and trophy, 2nd £90 and cup, 3rd £70 and trophy. 8 bands competed. Sept. 19, 2009, 7:22 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 11:15 p.m. 1 Fishburn Band Ian Robinson 2 British Steel Teesside Garry Cutt 3 Northumbria Police Band Hugh Megarrell 4 Kirkbymoorside Town Band John Woodward 5 Easington Colliery Band Barry Holden 6 Houghton Brass Tom Gibson 7 Durham Constabulary Dennis Noble 8 NASUWT Riverside Roger Payne Withdrawn Barrow Shipyard Band William Maginn Withdrawn Reg Vardy Band Unknown
